name: gfw-water
description: Global Forest Watch for Water Application.

scripts.start: npm run babel -- -w & gulp start & gulp serve
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist; gulp dist; npm run optimize; node scripts/prerender;
scripts.dist-www: npm run dist; cp -r dist/* www; echo $HTPASSWD > .htpasswd
scripts.postinstall: bower install; if [ "$NODE_ENV" = 'production' ]; then npm run dist-www; fi
scripts.optimize: npm run babel; r.js -o map.build.js; r.js -o home.build.js; r.js -o report.build.js;

author: BlueRaster <http://www.blueraster.com/>
